description:
Our spacious and comfortable one bedroom apartment with exposed brick has a true city feeling!  It comfortably fits two and is centrally located on a quiet street, just one block from the subway station and only twenty minutes from Manhattan.

Cozy Brownstone apartment with exposed brick.  Free cable and internet.

Guest have exclusive access to apartment during rental.

Feel free to call host if needed.

Quiet and friendly block

Conviently located near subway station, alternate side street parking, tweenty five minute drive from JFK and Laguardia airport.

Property is near a restaurant,  bar, club, laundrymat, bank, trainstation, bus stop and coffee shop.
name: Cozy Brownstone Apartment Near City
review: Thank you so much for letting us stay in your beautiful brownstone! It was one of the highlights of our trip. The neighborhood was quaint and picturesque. The subway was around the corner, which was very convenient if you quickly want to head to Manhattan. Definitely will recommend this spot for others.
